data.text: The word that Jeremiah the prophet spake unto Baruch the son of Neriah, when he had written these words in a book at the mouth of Jeremiah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, saying,
Thou didst say, Woe is me now! for the
¶ Thus shalt thou say unto him, The
And seekest thou great things for thyself? seek
